Operation.xpath: /Defs/RecipeDef[@ParentName="EPIA_RecipeUpgradeBionic"] [defName="CreatePowerArm" or defName="CreatePowerClaw" or defName="CreateBionicArm" or defName="CreateBionicHand" or defName="EPIA_UpgradeBionicFinger" or defName="CreateBionicLeg" or defName="CreateBionicFoot" or defName="EPIA_UpgradeBionicToe"]

/Defs/HediffDef[@ParentName="addedPartAdvanced"] [defName="AdvancedPowerArm" or defName="AdvancedPowerClaw" or defName="AdvancedBionicArm" or defName="AdvancedBionicHand" or defName="AdvancedBionicFinger" or defName="AdvancedBionicLeg" or defName="AdvancedBionicFoot" or defName="AdvancedBionicToe"]

/Defs/ThingDef[@ParentName="EPIA_UpgradeBodyPartAdvancedBionicBase"] [defName="AdvancedPowerArm" or defName="AdvancedPowerClaw" or defName="AdvancedBionicArm" or defName="AdvancedBionicHand" or defName="AdvancedBionicFinger" or defName="AdvancedBionicLeg" or defName="AdvancedBionicFoot" or defName="AdvancedBionicToe"]

/Defs/RecipeDef[@ParentName="EPIA_RecipeUpgradeAdvanced"] [defName="CreateAdvancedPowerArm" or defName="CreateAdvancedPowerClaw" or defName="CreateAdvancedBionicArm" or defName="CreateAdvancedBionicHand" or defName="EPIA_UpgradeAdvancedBionicFinger" or defName="CreateAdvancedBionicLeg" or defName="CreateAdvancedBionicFoot" or defName="EPIA_UpgradeAdvancedBionicToe"]

/Defs/RecipeDef[@ParentName="EPIASurgeryAdvancedBionic"] [defName="InstallAdvancedPowerArm" or defName="InstallAdvancedPowerClaw" or defName="InstallAdvancedBionicArm" or defName="InstallAdvancedBionicHand" or defName="InstallAdvancedBionicFinger" or defName="InstallAdvancedBionicLeg" or defName="InstallAdvancedBionicFoot" or defName="InstallAdvancedBionicToe"]
